India's G. Sathiyan continued his good show in the World Table Tennis Championships and qualified for the men's singles main draw here on Tuesday. Sathiyan, ranked 188 in the world, beat Chilean Felipe Olivares 11-7, 11-8, 11-8, 11-4 in the final ...
